byId.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    emit doc._id, null

bySlug.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    emit doc.slug, null

byUser.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    for member in doc.members
      emit member.user, null
    for admin in doc.admins
      emit admin.user, null

byName.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    emit doc.name.toLowerCase(), null

byInvitedUser.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    for invitation in doc.invited
      emit invitation.user, null

byCreation.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group'
    emit doc.created, null

byGeoSquare.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'group' and doc.position?
    [lat, lng] = doc.position
    lat = Math.floor lat
    lng = Math.floor lng
    emit [lat,lng], null
